sub_title: Department lead YieldStar applications Development & Engineering at ASML
summary:
Technology leader with a proven track record in software, hardware and artificial intelligence: I have build and lead R&D teams in healthtech and the semiconductor space on imaging and data acquisition combined with machine intelligence and cloud deployment.

I am a builder: of teams, solutions and people; I am driven by curiosity and a desire to improve people's lives through breakthrough innovation in the fields of physics, artificial intelligence and biology. Having worked on enabling a data driven health care to increase the quality and efficiency of global health care I am now applying myself to driving the advancement of microchip manufacturing through advanced semiconductor metrology solutions.

I thrive in interdisciplinary teams; my experience and education in the biology of disease, the physics of measurement & control systems and the architecture of scale out software solutions and machine learning applications have allowed me to recruit, lead, inspire and be a valued player in highly successful teams.
